comment: Professor Cain is amazing. I took him this summer for my ITEC class and I learned so much. The directions were explained so perfectly and he left amazing feedback. He also allows for resubmits and, to be honest, I didn't turn in most of my work until the end of the semester and still made a 98%. I 100% recommend taking a class with him if you can!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: Easy A as long as you do the work!!! Great summer class definitely recommend

Same content and modules for everyone no matter who you take. Don't bother taking in-person. Few assignments but they can take a while. You're building a portfolio of lessons and activities and resources you create using a variety of online tools (nearpod, padlet, hyperdoc, etc) 5 quizzes with 2 chances that show you right answers after first try.

This course was online over the summer. No need to take it in person. Lots of tedious directions to follow to complete assignments. You're creating digital "artifacts" every week. Lots of voice recording so make sure you have a quiet place. Very strict details and steps to follow, and it can take up a lot of time. Just the nature of the course.

This course online is pretty cookie-cutter with every other section. It's all just an online module that was created by one professor where everyone does the same thing. I took it during the summer so it is a lot of work that is pretty condensed, but this isn't the professor's fault, it's just the nature of the course. Lots of tedious details.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--Online Savvy

comment: Dr. Cain is AMAZING!! Definitely take him if you have the chance. He is very caring and just wants to make everything as easy as possible for his classes. Cant say enough great things about him!

Dr. Cain is so nice! All you really have to do is show up, there's points given each class for being there. He is sort of strict about phones but gives breaks throughout class. He normally ends class early and all you really have to do is show up and complete the assignment.

This was a great class with Dr. Cain. He was easy to get ahold of - important for an online class. He gives excellent feedback and is a pretty easy grader. If you follow the rubrics, youll be fine. Excellent video tutorials on every module!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: I absolutely loved this class. I have never enjoyed an 8am class in my life, but I enjoyed this one. Dr. Cain is very caring and respects his students. He is hilarious and made learning technology fun for all of us. I wish I could take him for more classes every semester. This class is a lot of work, but when you come to class it is easy.
Great professor and cares about his students
I absolutely love Dr. Cain!!! He is one of the best professors in Bagwell and I would recommend him to everyone!! He is THE BEST. Would have him for every class if I could
I LOVE DR CAIN!!! By far one of my favorite professors I've had in Bagwell. Actually learned about technology while enjoying it. 10/10 recommend.
